attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seasoned wood is a carbon neutral product and doesn't do any harm to the environment and doesn't cost half as much as gas/electric fires cost to the environment if burned correctly.  It is "white smoke" - unlike coal and other carbon monoxide producing fuels.  Surely burning a carbon neutral product is better for the environment and resources. £1K fine if caught burning in a SCA!BBQ's therefore shouldn't be allowed then!! Please re-evaluate this.  Thank you.
